Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is partly spotted with a grey resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown-slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394686) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394686)
